definition: ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: If your ink block is ground unevenly(12), it shows you have a poor state of mind(13).
sentences.chinese: 如果墨條磨的偏向一邊，顯示出你的心地不莊重。

sentences.english: If my ink block is ground unevenly, it shows I have poor state of mind.
sentences.chinese: 墨條如果被磨的偏向一邊，就表明自己的心不端正。
